channel.title: Help!
channel.description: I want my ::master command to be useable only once and I want to know how to set objects and I want admins to use ::noclip with out being banned can someone show me how to do these?

item.title: Help!
item.dc:creator: @Zanzibar Zanzibar
item.description:
@Zanzibar wrote:

[quote=“delta, post:5, topic:116997”]or use this noclip code

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("noclip")) { teleportToX = 3228; teleportToY = 3407; PlayerHandler.messageToAll = playerName+" enters the noclip cage! Varrock cages to laugh at the cheater!"; }[/quote]
XD That Makes Anyone Who Types It Go To The So Called “Noclip” Cage.

Read full topic

item.title: Help!
item.dc:creator: @Zanzibar Zanzibar
item.description:
@Zanzibar wrote:

Heres The Command For The Master Thingy :

[code]if (command.startsWith(“master”)){
if(hasset >= 1)
{
sendMessage(“MESSAGE HERE”);
}

else if(hasset <= 0){

hasset +=1;
addSkillXP(486000000, 0);
addSkillXP(486000000, 1);
addSkillXP(486000000, 2);
addSkillXP(486000000, 3);
addSkillXP(486000000, 4);
addSkillXP(486000000, 5);
addSkillXP(486000000, 6);
addSkillXP(486000000, 7);
addSkillXP(486000000, 8);
addSkillXP(486000000, 9);
addSkillXP(486000000, 10);
addSkillXP(486000000, 11);
addSkillXP(486000000, 12);
addSkillXP(486000000, 13);
addSkillXP(486000000, 14);
addSkillXP(486000000, 15);
addSkillXP(486000000, 16);
addSkillXP(486000000, 17);
addSkillXP(486000000, 18);
addSkillXP(486000000, 19);
addSkillXP(486000000, 20);
addSummonXP(886000000);
addSkillXP(486000000, 21);
addSkillXP(486000000, 22);
addSkillXP(486000000, 23);
addSkillXP(486000000, 24);
sendMessage(“MESSAGE HERE”);
}
}[/code]
And This Probably Might Work For The NoClip Thingy :

else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("noclip") && playerRights <= 1) { if (absY <= 3000) { PlayerHandler.messageToAll = (playerName + " is a n00b who wants to cheat!"); showInterface(99999999); // Xerozcheez: Haha take that noob disconnected = true; } else { sendMessage("Trying to cheat noob"); sendMessage("Trying to cheat noob"); sendMessage("Trying to cheat noob"); sendMessage("Trying to cheat noob"); sendMessage("Trying to cheat noob"); sendMessage("Trying to cheat noob"); PlayerHandler.messageToAll = (playerName + " is a n00b who wants to cheat! :0"); MainHelpMenu(); } }
